duties_responsibilities.duty: Promote and sell Xfinity products and services to individual customers by visiting them at their homes in an assigned territory.
Maintain a detailed knowledge of Xfinity products and communicate the benefits to customers.
Evaluate individual customers' existing and potential product needs and make recommendations.
Meet and exceed sales goals as established by local market leadership.
Generate business through established and approved methods of lead generation.
Implement effective sales closing techniques to ensure product installation goals are achieved.
Consistently demonstrate success in residential canvassing sales environment with emphasis on business to consumer sales.
Illustrate strong technical capability, including computer knowledge, billing systems, and databases.
Meet the physical requirements of the job, including the ability to walk and travel door-to-door for considerable distances in all types of weather conditions.
Acquire and maintain any credentials and/or licenses vital to sell and/or design alarm systems as required by law.
Consistently exercise independent judgment and discretion in matters of significance.
Work nights and weekends, variable schedules, and overtime as needed.
Perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned.
